Introduction
This topic contains information on the jurisdiction of cases at the PMCs, including
type of work
performed by the PMCs
, and
not performed by the PMCs
electric claims folders (eFolders)
mandatory use of eFolders
compensation claims received after Veterans Pension entitlement is established
claims for both compensation and Veterans Pension
pension-related end product (EP) 330 established by automation
reviewing and disposing of EP 330 for pension-related hospital reports
burial claims
claims for Parents’ Dependency and Indemnity Compensation (DIC)
, and
matching programs reports processed by PMCs
.
title: M21-1, Part I, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C - Pension Management Center (PMC) Procedures
citation: Part I, Subpart ii, Chapter 1, Section C
